values: 法院；法庭；球场（如网球场、篮球场）；宫廷；王室；公寓大楼；短街；（尤指）全体审判人员；王室人员；朝臣；侍臣；董事会；理事会；庭院；院子；建筑物的开阔部分（常有玻璃房顶）
求爱；追求（感情或关系）；（为有所求；尤指寻求支持而）献殷勤；招致（风险或不幸）；酿成；竭力争取；冒险；寻求（支持、注意等）；试图吸引；向…讨好

synonym.mean: 招致；向…献殷勤；设法获得

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 殷勤的；被承认的；出于礼节的
尊严而有礼貌的；奉承的；有宫廷气派的，威严的

word_mean_info__list.difference: 一般指附属于学校或公园内的活动场地，也可指游乐场或儿童游戏场地。
指周围有看台的露天大型运动场。
通常指周围有围墙的专用球场。
可简写为gym，指不受天气影响的室内体育馆、健身房或运动场馆。

word_group.brief_definition: 美食街, 美食广场；餐饮区
最高法院；英国最高法院；美国联邦最高法院
高等法院；高等刑事法院
全体法官；法院；法庭，审判庭
法庭纪律；法庭记录，审判记录
捕获物法庭；战利品法庭；捕获法庭
人头牌, 花牌 (纸牌的 K、Q 或 J)

bilingual.target: 他在法院上赢得了案件。
法院判定他是犯罪分子。

bilingual.source: The court decided to annul the contract.
The court found him guilty of sodomy.
bilingual.target: 法院判定他犯有鸡奸罪。

bilingual.source: The international court is located in Hague.
The court ruled in favor of the claimant.

list.abstract: court（英 [kɔːt]，美 [kɔːrt]），英语单词，作名词为全体法官；法院；法庭。作动词为向…求爱；求；向…献殷勤。例句：He cured the son of the Prince and was invited to be an official in that court .（他治好了王子儿子的病，并被邀请到朝廷做官。） court的近义词有banc等。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, I'll see if I can get anywhere in court.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那行，我去和法院打招呼。

yingyinNormal.en: A Supreme Court confirmation in the middle of an election?
yingyinNormal.zh: 大选期间确认最高法院提名？

yingyinNormal.en: You've also got something from the Pasadena Municipal Court.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这儿还有一封帕萨迪纳市法院寄来的东西。

yingyinNormal.en: I submit to the court, 10:00. The court laughs in your face.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我提请法院批准，改为晚上十点。法院当着你的面哈哈大笑。

yingyinNormal.en: Alicia Florrick. I'll be right there. I have to go to court.
yingyinNormal.zh: 艾丽西娅·福瑞克，我马上就到，我得去法院了。

yingyinNormal.en: Help me convince him. Take the seat on the court where you belong.
yingyinNormal.zh: 帮我说服他，接受最高法院你应得的那个职位。

yingyinNormal.en: It's not that big a deal. You just go down to the court on Thursday and you pay the fine.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没什么大不了的，你只要周四去法院交罚金就行。

yingyinNormal.en: I guess now I can add "Fish poop remover" to my resume next to "Supreme court intern."
yingyinNormal.zh: 我想我现在可以在我简历上的"最高法院实习生"后加上"鱼粪清洁员"。

yingyinNormal.en: Why do you care? You're gonna be a Supreme Court justice. Why does this even matter to you?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你为何还这么在意，你就要成为最高法院法官了，这一切跟你还有什么关系？

yingyinNormal.en: I want people registering for jobs in every part of the city as soon as possible, before the court challenges bubble up.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我希望全城各处的人都赶紧去注册找工作，越快越好，趁法院还没发难。

yingyinNormal.en: She's a remarkable girl. The youngest appeals court judge in New Jersey and a two time Olympic bronze medalist.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她是个出众的女孩子，新泽西州最年轻的上诉法院法官，还两次获得奥运会铜牌。

yingyinNormal.en: I don't understand, Heather. I offered you a seat on the Supreme Court. If Jacobs was stepping down, which he isn't.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不理解，希瑟，我给了你最高法院的位置。前提是雅各布斯辞职，但他不会。

yingyinNormal.en: Actually, it kind of... Let's keep looking. Whoa, what's $1,800 to the Los Angeles County Superior Court?
yingyinNormal.zh: 实际上这就是...我们还是继续看吧，哪儿来的洛杉矶高等法院的1800美金罚款？

yingyinNormal.en: It's very nice talking to you, Alicia. You could make it all the way to the Supreme Court, Alicia. You're that amazing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 很高兴跟你聊天，艾丽西娅，你可以一路走到最高法院，艾丽西娅，你有那么棒。

yingyinNormal.en: The Congress is in disarray, the Supreme Court is down a justice and doomed to deadlock, and the executive branch is without a boss.
yingyinNormal.zh: 国会吵成一团，最高法院少了一位法官，必将陷入僵局，而行政机关也群龙无首。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, Inspector Gadget. And I want to say Supreme Court Justice Ruth Bader Ginsburg. So close. Kooth Bader Ginsburg.
yingyinNormal.zh: 神探加杰特。你的话我猜我国现任最高法院法官鲁斯·巴德·金斯伯格。很接近了。是库萨斯·巴德·金斯伯格。

yingyinNormal.en: You don't need to reimburse me because I'm not paying. On Thursday, I will have my day in court and justice will be done. In fact, I'm going to begin preparing my defense right now.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不用你还，因为我不会交的。周四那天，我会去法院，正义会得到伸张，我现在就着手准备辩护。

yingyinNormal.en: No. Also, I'm pulling the Toobin piece on the Supreme Court women, woman. And I need to see a new draft on that piece about shopping for a plastic surgeon. It's dull.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不行 还有，图比做的那篇，关于最高法院里的女性，不能上，还有那篇关于选购整形手术医生的文章要重写，太平淡了。

yingyinNormal.en: Not according to the Supreme Court. In Maryland v. King... Which is a general rule. The specific law in this state, Your Honor, is very, very clear about that.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但根据马里兰对金案的最高法院判定，这是一般条款，而我说的是这个州的特别法，法官阁下，对这一点规定可是非常明确的。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm very happy to report that I've just come back from federal court, where my legal team won a major victory for Chumhum against these intrusions on all of our privacy rights by the NSA!
yingyinNormal.zh: 我很高兴地告诉大家，我刚从联邦法院回来，我的律师团为查查网取得 了重大的胜利，粉碎了国家安全局对我们隐私权的侵犯。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 最高法院；英国最高法院；美国联邦最高法院

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 礼貌；有礼貌；谦恭；谦恭有礼的言语；免费的；屈膝礼
n. 求爱期；求婚期；求爱；求婚；奉承；取悦；求偶

word_family.mean: n. 全体法官；法院；法庭；审判庭；球场；朝臣；侍臣；董事；理事；宫廷

examination_example.sentence: It is welcomed by the Supreme <highlight>Court</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最高法院对此表示欢迎。

examination_example.sentence: He taught himself shorthand to get an even better job later as a <highlight>court</highlight> stenographer and as a reporter in Parliament.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为了得到一份更好的工作，他自学了速记，后来成为了法庭速记员和国会记者。

examination_example.sentence: Despite the appeals <highlight>court</highlight>'s decision, big questions remain unanswered.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管上诉法院做出了裁决，一些重大问题仍然没有得到解答。

sense_info_list.en: the establishment, retinue, and courtiers of a sovereign

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Court</highlight>, school, organizations of amateurs, and the traveling actors were all rivals in supplying a widespread desire for dramatic entertainment.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 宫廷、学校、业余爱好者组织和巡回演员在满足对戏剧娱乐的广泛需求方面都是竞争对手。

examination_example.sentence: Plays aiming at literary distinction were written for schools or <highlight>court</highlight>, or for the choir boys of St. Paul's.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 旨在突出文学特色的戏剧是为学校或宫廷，或为圣保罗的唱诗班男孩写的。

examination_example.sentence: There is space for playing fields and the money to pave tennis and netball <highlight>courts</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有场地做运动场，有钱铺砌网球场和无挡板篮球场。

sense_info_list.en: pay special attention to someone in an attempt to win their support or favor

word_usage.usage: court作名词，表示“全体出庭人员”时，常用单数形式，前面加定冠词the，如：Please tell the court what happened.

sense_info_list.en: an assembly (including one or more judges) to conduct judicial business

examination_example.sentence: It is bringing the case to the local district <highlight>court</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它正把这个案子提交给当地的地方法院。

examination_example.sentence: While the city council vote was met with applause inside the council room, opponents to the measure, including soda lobbyists, made sharp criticisms and a promise to challenge the tax in <highlight>court</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管市政府投票在议事厅获得了赞扬支持，但包括汽水游说者在内的反对者对这项措施提出了尖锐的批评，并承诺将在法院质疑这项征税。

sense_info_list.en: the establishment; retinue; and courtiers of a sovereign
pay special attention to someone in an attempt to win their support or favor

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: the establishment, retinue, and courtiers of a sovereign

examination_example.sentence: Includes a guided tour of Windsor and Hampton <highlight>Court</highlight>, Henry Ⅷ's favorite palace.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 包括参观温莎古堡和亨利八世最喜欢的汉普顿宫。

sense_info_list.en: an assembly (including one or more judges) to conduct judicial business

examination_example.sentence: O'Connor gave the deciding vote in many important cases during her 24 years on the top <highlight>court</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 奥康纳在最高法院任职24年期间，对许多重要案件都投了决定性的一票。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 羽毛球场；羽毛球场地；羽毛球赛场

sense_info_list.en: an assembly (including one or more judges) to conduct judicial business

examination_example.sentence: It was like he wasn't even on the <highlight>court</highlight>!
examination_example.sentence_trans: 就像他根本不在法庭上一样！

examination_example.sentence: Even though he achieved his father's dream, he didn't want to continue working for the <highlight>court</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管他实现了父亲的梦想，但他并不想继续在法院工作。

examination_example.sentence: One year later, he left the <highlight>court</highlight> and returned to be a doctor again.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一年后，他离开了法院，再次做回医生。

sense_info_list.en: the establishment, retinue, and courtiers of a sovereign

examination_example.sentence: A large amount of high-quality paper was made as presents to the <highlight>Court</highlight> (宫廷).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大量高质量的纸张被制作成礼物送给宫廷。

examination_example.sentence: When he was 38, he cured the son of the Prince and was invited to be an official in that <highlight>court</highlight> (宫廷).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 38岁时，他治好了王子儿子的病，并被邀请到宫廷做官。

sense_info_list.en: a place where games such as tennis are played

examination_example.sentence: And his performance on the <highlight>court</highlight> (球场) caused excitement and got much attention.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 以及他在球场上的表现引起了人们的兴奋和关注。

examination_example.sentence: Apple Club Two outdoor tennis <highlight>courts</highlight>(场地)with lights.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 苹果俱乐部：两个有灯光的室外网球场。

examination_example.sentence: Four badminton <highlight>courts</highlight>, a room with six table tennis tables and one equipment shop.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 四个羽毛球场，一个有六张乒乓球桌的房间和一个设备商店。
